titleStmt.title: The ansvveres of some brethren of the ministerie to the replyes of the ministers and professours of divinitie in Aberdeene, concerning the late convenant.
titleStmt.author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.
Dickson, David, 1583?-1663.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Master Alexander Hamilton, Master David Dickson.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
